sen.j: 佐伯 子麻呂（さえき の こまろ、生年不詳 - 天智天皇5年（666年））は贈・大錦上の役人。
sen.e: Saeki no komaro (year of birth unknown - 666) is a government official of zo, daikinjo (the seventh grade of twenty-six of cap rank, which corresponds to Shoshii, Senior Fourth Rank and Jushii, Junior Fourth Rank of Taiho Ritsuryo, Taiho Code).

Saeki no Komaro (the year of birth unknown - 666) was a government official of zo-daikinjo (the seventh grade of twenty-six of cap rank, which corresponds to Shoshii, Senior Fourth Rank and Jushii, Junior Fourth Rank of Taiho Ritsuryo, Taiho Code).
sen.cmt: 文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: Saeki no Komaro (the year of birth unknown - 666) was a government official of zo-daikinjo (the seventh grade of twenty-six of cap rank, which corresponds to Shoshii, Senior Fourth Rank and Jushii, Junior Fourth Rank of Taiho Ritsuryo, Taiho Code).
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: His family name is Omi.
His Kabane (family name) was Omi.
sen.cmt: 文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: His Kabane (family name) was Omi.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 644年に子麻呂は中大兄皇子（後の天智天皇）に臣従する。
sen.e: He commenced to serve Naka no Oe no Oji (later known as Emperor Tenji) in 644.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: He started serving for Naka no Oe no Oji (later the Emperor Tenji) in 644.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に訂正しました。
sen.e: He started serving for Naka no Oe no Oji (later the Emperor Tenji) in 644.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 645年6月に宮廷で朝堂一の実力者・蘇我入鹿大臣の暗殺に参加する。
sen.e: In June, 645, he was involved in the assassination of SOGA no Iruka minister, the most influential person in chodo (the Imperial court).
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: In June, 645, he was involved in the assassination of SOGA no Iruka which was carried out in the Imperial Court; SOGA no Iruka was a minister and one of the most powerful politicians in chodo (the Imperial court).
sen.cmt: 文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: In June, 645, he was involved in the assassination of SOGA no Iruka which was carried out in the Imperial Court; SOGA no Iruka was a minister and one of the most powerful politicians in chodo (the Imperial court).
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかし暗殺直前には飯が喉を通らずに吐くほど緊張したと伝えられる。
sen.e: It is said that before the assassination, he was too nervous to eat something.
It is said that before the assassination, he was too nervous to eat anything.
sen.cmt: 文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: It is said that before the assassination, he was too nervous to eat anything.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 暗殺実行時、入鹿に斬りつけ、皇極天皇にこの事態の説明を求める入鹿の息の根を止めたという。
sen.e: At the time of assassination, he put the sword to Iruka and killed Iruka, who asked Empress Kogyoku what was going on.
It is said that on the assassination, he stabbed Iruka to death, who was just asking Empress Kogyoku what was happening.
sen.cmt: 訳抜けと文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: It is said that on the assassination, he stabbed Iruka to death, who was just asking Empress Kogyoku what was happening.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: また、同じ年の11月には中大兄皇子のライバル・古人大兄皇子討伐事件にも関与していたという。
sen.e: In November in the same year, he was also involved in the subjugation of Furuhito no Oe no Miko, who was a rival of Naka no Oe no Oji.
It is said that, in November of the year, he was also involved in the affair of defeating Furuhito no Oe no Miko, who was a rival of Naka no Oe no Oji.
sen.cmt: 訳抜けと文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: It is said that, in November of the year, he was also involved in the affair of defeating Furuhito no Oe no Miko, who was a rival of Naka no Oe no Oji.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 天智天皇5年（666年）には病気になった子麻呂を中大兄皇子が見舞いに来て、子麻呂の功績を誉め称え、病床にあった子麻呂は嘆き悲しんだという。
sen.e: In 666, when Naka no Oe no Oji visited Komaro, who became ill, Naka no Oe no Oji praised komaro's achievements, and komaro was grieved in bed.
In 666 when Naka no Oe no Oji visited Komaro who was ill in bed, Naka no Oe no Oji praised Komaro's achievements, which made Komaro cry.
sen.cmt: 文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: In 666 when Naka no Oe no Oji visited Komaro who was ill in bed, Naka no Oe no Oji praised Komaro's achievements, which made Komaro cry.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: やがて間もなく子麻呂は亡くなったと思われる。
sen.e: Probably, soon after that, komaro passed away.
Soon after that, Komaro sseemed to pass away.
sen.cmt: 文法誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: Soon after that, Komaro is thought to be deceased.
sen.cmt: 原文により近くなるように修正しました。
